scripts.build: cd clientside && npm install && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd clientside && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run client" "npm run admin"
scripts.backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run server
scripts.client: cd clientside && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.admin: cd admin && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../clientside && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
